message:
SYSTEM: OWL.pdf: Página 29
Disjoint Classes (II)
•
Making the classes Pizza, PizzaTopping and PizzaBase disjoint from
one another.
•
This means that it is not possible for an individual to be a member of a combination of
these classes – it would not make sense for an individual to be a Pizza and a PizzaBase
these classes – it would not make sense for an individual to be a Pizza and a PizzaBase.
© O. Corcho, MC Suárez de Figueroa Baonza
